biology
  specialized an evergreen tree (= one that never loses its leaves) with flat leaves like needles and small, red fruits. There are many different types of taxus. : The ancient conifer forest consisted mainly of pine, spruce, and taxus. The drugs are made from the bark of the Pacific Yew tree or taxus. Synonym
yew
More examplesFewer examplesTaxus species are ideal if you want a dark green hedge.Since this forest contained taxus, it probably did not have temperatures in the wintertime that were any colder than minus 17.A substance which occurs naturally in the bark of the evergreen Pacific yew tree (Taxus brevifolia) has been shown in trials to offer promising activity against certain forms of cancer.
